title: Base Counter

description.content: Counters inform users about the quantity of items indicated by a glyph.
Counters consist of a number and some background color and are placed on the ‘end of the line’ in reading direction of the item they state the count for.
Counters convey information, they are not interactive.
Counters inform users about the quantity of items indicated by a glyph.

rules: A Counter MUST only be used in combination with a glyph.
A Counter MUST contain exactly one number greater than zero and no other characters.
